title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, the popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not appearing.
OB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, no menu is displayed to add breakpoints/marks.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
The menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks and perform other actions.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
Observe that the expected menu does not appear.
